name.th: ไอดล์ ไดซ์

short.am,ar,bn,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_GB,en_U: Enjoy Idle Dice directly in your Chrome browser! Play anytime. Try it now!
short.bg: Насладете се на Idle Dice директно в браузъра си Chrome! Играйте по всяко време. Опитайте го сега!
short.ca,lt: Profitez d'Idle Dice directement dans votre navigateur Chrome ! Jouez à tout moment. Essayez maintenant !
short.es: Enjoy Idle Dice directamente en tu navegador Chrome! Juega en cualquier momento. ¡Pruébalo ahora!
short.et,id: ¡Disfruta de Idle Dice directamente en tu navegador Chrome! Juega en cualquier momento. ¡Pruébalo ahora!
short.fi: Nauti Idle Dicesta suoraan Chrome-selaimessasi! Pelaa milloin tahansa. Kokeile nyt!
short.fil: Mag-enjoy ng Idle Dice nang direkta sa iyong Chrome browser! Maglaro kahit kailan. Subukan mo na!
short.he,no: ¡Disfruta de Idle Dice directamente en tu navegador Chrome! ¡Juega en cualquier momento. ¡Pruébalo ahora!
short.hu: Enjoy Idle Dice directly in your Chrome böngészőjében! Játszani bárhol. Próbáld ki most!
short.it: Goditi Idle Dice direttamente nel tuo browser Chrome! Gioca in qualsiasi momento. Provalo ora!
short.lv: Iepriecinies Idle Dice tiešsaistē savā pārlūkprogrammā Chrome! Spēlējiet jebkurā laikā. Pamēģini tagad!
short.ms: Nikmati Idle Dice terus dalam pelayar Chrome anda! Main bila-bila masa. Cuba sekarang!
short.nl: Enjoy Idle Dice direct in je Chrome browser! Speel altijd. Probeer het nu!
short.ro: Bucură-te de Idle Dice direct în browser-ul Chrome! Joacă oricând. Încearcă acum!
short.ru: Наслаждайтесь игрой Idle Dice прямо в своем браузере Chrome! Играйте в любое время. Попробуйте сейчас!
short.sl: Uživajte v igri Idle Dice neposredno v brskalniku Chrome! Igrajte kadarkoli. Poskusite zdaj!
short.sr: Uživajte u Idle Dice direktno u svom Chrome pretraživaču! Igrajte kad god želite. Isprobajte sada!
short.vi: Thưởng thức Idle Dice trực tiếp trên trình duyệt Chrome của bạn! Chơi bất cứ lúc nào. Hãy thử ngay bây giờ!
short.zh_CN: 请在 Chrome 浏览器中直接享受《闲置骰子》！随时玩。现在就试试吧！
short.zh_TW: Enjoy Idle Dice 直接在您的 Chrome 瀏覽器中！隨時遊玩。立即試試看！

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
🎲 Idle Dice is Here! 🎲

Idle Dice expands on the gameplay of its predecessor and adds even more exciting features:

🎲 MORE DICE
Upgrade up to 25 dice independently for endless fun!

🃏 MORE CARDS
The basic set of cards is too boring for you? Idle Dice 2 features cards that don't exist in the real world. Why limit yourself to 13 cards when you could draw the whole alphabet?

🃏 CREATE YOUR DECK
Choose which cards to add to your deck and master various challenges!

💯 FAIR PLAY
Like all my games, watching ads is entirely optional and the game is balanced so you can progress without spending money.

🌙 DARK MODE
The most requested feature for Idle Dice 1 is finally here!!

The game is still being developed, and more content will be added. Be part of the development by joining the Discord server and giving your feedback.

Let's roll into a new adventure! 🎲✨
